MainMessage.en: Are you communicating or just talking?

MainMessage2.en: Everyone struggles with communication sometimes. No matter how hard we try, we can't always get through. So how can you reach people you've struggled with before? Is there a key to understanding the people we interact with... and ourselves?
MainMessage2.ch: 我们跟人沟通有时会卡住，无论怎么努力好像都没有用。面对你沟通困难的人，怎么跟他们互动才有效呢？有没有一把钥匙能够打开人内心世界的大门，读懂对方也读懂自己？
